name: Bridgelogix
overview: Bridgelogix Corporation provides a set of barcode data collection solutions for Infor ERP solutions. It offers barcode data collection solutions for applications, such as Baan, BPCS, ERPLN, and ERPLX. The company develops solutions that cover barcoding of transactions, such as receiving, putaway, cycle counting, production order completions, and shipping; and offers embedded solutions for warehouse management, time and attendance, and lean manufacturing. It also provides Bridgelogix Support Portal, a Web-based interface that provides a way to submit an issue, review reports, search and lookup submitted issues, post company events, and search a knowledge base. The companyâ€™s solutions enable Baan, BPCS, ERPLN, and LX users to harness the barcode technology to simplify the flow of material and labor related data through their supply chain. It enables manufacturing and distribution companies to simplify and automate their supply chain business processes. The company serves aerospace and defense, automotive, consumer packaged goods, high-tech electronics, food and beverage, industrial machinery and equipment, life sciences, packaging, and cable industries. Bridgelogix Corporation was founded in 1999 and is based in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
